import React, { useState } from 'react' import './Sellbook.css' import { Form } from 'react-bootstrap' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' function Sellbook() { const [bookDetails,setProjectDetails] = useState({ bookname:"",author:"",price:"",bookImage:"" }) const handleSell = () => { console.log('Form Values:', bookDetails); // Perform form submission logic here // ... // Redirect or show a success message after selling }; return ( <>

Book Name :

setProjectDetails({...bookDetails,bookname:e.target.value})} />

setProjectDetails({...bookDetails,author:e.target.value})} />

Price :

setProjectDetails({...bookDetails,price:e.target.value})} />
) } export default Sellbook
